item.title: My minigame, Skeleton killa
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

A while ago, i added a custom minigame, called Skeleton Killa. You kill skeletons, earn SKP, and get prizes. But whenever u log out, or server laggs the points get reset. how would i fix. here are the codes for when you kill an npc.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 90) { PlayerHandler.SkeletonKilled += 1; temp.SkeletonKilled += 1 + misc.random(2); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1973) { PlayerHandler.SkeletonKilled += 1; temp.SkeletonKilled += 3; }

what would i change this to? if you need any other codes comment

Read full topic
